attributes.action: Recognise Freddie and Giulia St George of The Italian Job Charity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like Freddie and Giulia St George (son and mother) to be awarded for raising, now in excess of, £2 million during 19 years of The Italian Job rally.  The money has gone to some of the most deprived children in the country.  Awarding these two selfless people would help them raise more money due to official recognition. Thank you.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
